#summary Compile, package, run and debug with ant

The [http://ant.apache.org/ apache ant] tool uses [http://java.sun.com/ java] to package, test and debug [Application a codebase].

Run

{{{
 ant -p
}}}

for a full list of options.

To compile and package run

{{{
 ant 
}}}

To upload to appengine, run
{{{
 ant update
}}}

 * However, first time per session use AppCfg from the command line.

Ant is the point of integration with NetBeans, Eclipse and other IDEs.
